manifest_description.message: + download to video player; + volume slider; preview supported; + right-click to download. v0.2.7 show post timestamp in dashboard

options_save_as_title.message: Open Save As dialogue while downloading

options_global_volume_title.message: Slider controls all videos / slider only take effect on current video

error_no_video_detected.message:
No video url detected.
Move your mouse on video player and try again.
error_no_video_detected.description: Error message, triggered when extension can't detect video url.
